story.name: f6a7e3dd-89df-45c2-a516-b499fa8dab90
story.title: Elliott renews demand for split up of Marathon Petroleum
story.summary: MARATHON PETROLEUM-ACTIVIST/ (URGENT):Elliott renews demand for split up of Marathon Petroleum

xmlText.p: Elliott renews demand for split up of Marathon Petroleum

Sept 25 (Reuters) - Elliott Management on Wednesday called for Marathon Petroleum Corp to split into three independent companies, three years after the activist investor demanded the refiner to undertake a strategic review and spin off its main businesses.

Elliott, holding an economic interest of about 2.5% in Marathon, said its renewed demand follows earlier promises of improvement by Marathon which the company has failed to deliver on. (Reporting by Shariq Khan in Bengaluru; Editing by Maju Samuel)
